userStories.title: User can add items to the cart
userStories.description: As a user, I want to be able to add items to my cart so that I can purchase multiple items at once.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the product page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click on the 'Add to Cart' button
acceptanceCriteria.then: The item should be added to my cart and I should see a confirmation message.

userStories.title: User can view the cart
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view my cart so that I can see the items I plan to purchase.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have items in my cart
acceptanceCriteria.when: I navigate to the cart page
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should see a list of all items in my cart along with their prices and a total amount.

userStories.title: User can proceed to checkout
userStories.description: As a user, I want to proceed to checkout so that I can complete my purchase.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the cart page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click on the 'Proceed to Checkout' button
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should be taken to the checkout page.

userStories.title: User can enter shipping information
userStories.description: As a user, I want to enter my shipping information so that my order can be delivered to the correct address.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the checkout page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I fill in my shipping details and click 'Continue'
acceptanceCriteria.then: My shipping information should be saved and I should be taken to the payment page.

userStories.title: User can select a payment method
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select a payment method so that I can pay for my order.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the payment page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I select a payment method and enter my payment details
acceptanceCriteria.then: My payment method should be saved and I should be able to proceed to place the order.

userStories.title: User can complete the order
userStories.description: As a user, I want to complete my order so that I can finalize my purchase.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have entered my shipping and payment information
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click on the 'Place Order' button
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should see an order confirmation page with my order details.

userStories.title: User receives order confirmation email
userStories.description: As a user, I want to receive an order confirmation email so that I have a record of my purchase.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have successfully placed an order
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should receive an email confirming my order details.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user can add items to the cart.
testCases.expectedResult: The item is added to the cart and a confirmation message is displayed.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user can view the cart.
testCases.expectedResult: The cart displays all items with their prices and total amount.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user can proceed to checkout.
testCases.expectedResult: The user is redirected to the checkout page.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user can enter shipping information.
testCases.expectedResult: The shipping information is saved and the user is taken to the payment page.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user can select a payment method.
testCases.expectedResult: The selected payment method is saved and the user can proceed to place the order.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user can complete the order.
testCases.expectedResult: The user sees an order confirmation page with order details.

testCases.objective: Verify that the user receives an order confirmation email.
testCases.expectedResult: The user receives an email confirming the order details.

userStories.title: User Signup Functionality
userStories.description: As a new user, I want to be able to sign up for an account securely so that I can access the application.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the signup page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I enter valid user details and click the signup button
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should receive a confirmation email and be redirected to the login page

userStories.title: User Login Functionality
userStories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in securely so that I can access my account.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the login page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I enter valid credentials and click the login button
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should be redirected to my dashboard

userStories.title: Password Recovery
userStories.description: As a user, I want to recover my password securely in case I forget it.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am on the login page
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click on the 'Forgot Password' link and enter my email
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should receive an email with instructions to reset my password

userStories.title: Email Verification for Signup
userStories.description: As a new user, I want to verify my email address after signing up to ensure my account is secure.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have signed up with a valid email address
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click on the verification link in the confirmation email
acceptanceCriteria.then: My email should be marked as verified and I should be able to log in

userStories.title: Two-Factor Authentication
userStories.description: As a user, I want to enable two-factor authentication for added security when logging in.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am logged into my account
acceptanceCriteria.when: I enable two-factor authentication in my account settings
acceptanceCriteria.then: I should receive a verification code via SMS or email during subsequent logins

testCases.objective: Verify user can sign up with valid details
testCases.expectedResult: User receives a confirmation email and is redirected to the login page

testCases.objective: Verify user can log in with valid credentials
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to their dashboard
User receives an email with password reset instructions
User's email is marked as verified and they can log in
User receives a verification code during subsequent logins

userStories.title: View Order History
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view my order history so that I can keep track of my past purchases.

acceptanceCriteria.given: the user is logged into their account
acceptanceCriteria.when: the user navigates to the 'Order History' section
acceptanceCriteria.then: the user should see a list of all their past orders with details such as order number, date, and total amount

userStories.title: View Order Details
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view the details of a specific order so that I can see what items were included.

acceptanceCriteria.given: the user is on the 'Order History' page
acceptanceCriteria.when: the user clicks on an order
acceptanceCriteria.then: the user should see the details of that order including item descriptions, quantities, and shipping information

userStories.title: Cancel Order
userStories.description: As a user, I want to cancel an order that I no longer want so that I can avoid unnecessary charges.

acceptanceCriteria.given: the user is viewing the details of an order
acceptanceCriteria.when: the user clicks the 'Cancel Order' button
acceptanceCriteria.then: the order should be marked as canceled and the user should receive a confirmation message

userStories.title: Reorder Items
userStories.description: As a user, I want to reorder items from a past order so that I can quickly purchase them again.

acceptanceCriteria.given: the user is viewing the details of a past order
acceptanceCriteria.then: the items from that order should be added to the shopping cart

userStories.title: Track Order Status
userStories.description: As a user, I want to track the status of my current orders so that I know when to expect delivery.

acceptanceCriteria.given: the user is on the 'Order History' page
acceptanceCriteria.when: the user clicks on an active order
acceptanceCriteria.then: the user should see the current status of the order (e.g., processing, shipped, delivered)

testCases.objective: Verify that users can view their order history.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees a list of all past orders with order number, date, and total amount.

testCases.objective: Verify that users can view details of a specific order.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees item descriptions, quantities, and shipping information for the selected order.

testCases.objective: Verify that users can cancel an order.
testCases.expectedResult: Order is marked as canceled and user receives a confirmation message.

testCases.objective: Verify that users can reorder items from a past order.
testCases.expectedResult: Items from the selected order are added to the shopping cart.

testCases.objective: Verify that users can track the status of their current orders.
testCases.expectedResult: User sees the current status of the order (e.g., processing, shipped, delivered).
